title: Deals: iPad 10th Gen for $279, AirTags 4-pack for $68

The iPad 10th gen model features a modern design, 10.9″ Retina LCD display, A14 chip, Touch ID on the power button, 64GB base storage, 12MP front and back cameras, all day ... Read More
author: OSXDaily
excerpt: Amazon is offering the 10th generation iPad at a 20% discount, taking the price down to $279 from the $349 retail price from Apple. The iPad 10th gen model features a modern design, 10.9″ Ret…
text: Amazon is offering the 10th generation iPad at a 20% discount, taking the price down to $279 from the $349 retail price from Apple. The iPad 10th gen model features a modern design, 10.9″ Retina LCD display, A14 chip, Touch ID on the power button, 64GB base storage, 12MP front and back cameras, all day battery life, and is available in four different color options. Get the iPad 10th gen for $349 (Discounted $100 from $349) One caveat to consider when looking at the 10th gen iPad is whether or not you want Apple Intelligence support on your iPad, because this model does not support those features. But for the price point, or your particular use case, or your opinions on Apple Intelligence in general, you might not care about that. Amazon is offering $50 off the AirPods Pro 2 with clinical grade hearing aid features, as well as some great deals on Apple Watch Series 10, AirTags 4-pack, the M2 MacBook Air, and M2 iPad Air in 13″ and 11″ sizes. Check out the deals below, and enjoy the savings from Amazon! AirTags 4-pack for $68 (down from $99) Amazon is selling the AirTags 4-pack for just $68 now, down from the prior low of $70, which is discounted from the $99 retail price. AirTags offer a super easy way to keep track of your personal belongings and pets, or just about anything else you might want to track with the Find My network. AirTags – 4-pack – $68 (down from $99) AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid functionality – $199 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 are wildly popular headphones, but what makes this particular model unique is they also offer a clinical-grade hearing aid feature for mild to moderate hearing loss, plus Media Assist features that enhances the clarity of music, video, and phone calls. This is in addition to the other popular standard features like high fidelity sound, Active Noice Cancellation, Spatial Audio, water and sweat resistance, customizable fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri commands, great battery life, and a USB-C charging case. AirPods Pro 2 – $199 (down from $249) Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic smart watch for fitness and activity tracking, featuring a 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, activity tracking features, sleep tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, and more. Check out the various band and color sizes to see which you like best. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon is offering the 10th generation iPad at a 20% discount, taking the price down to $279 from the $349 retail price from Apple. The iPad 10th gen model features a modern design, 10.9″ Retina LCD display, A14 chip, Touch ID on the power button, 64GB base storage, 12MP front and back cameras, all day battery life, and is available in four different color options.

  • Get the iPad 10th gen for $349 (Discounted $100 from $349)

One caveat to consider when looking at the 10th gen iPad is whether or not you want Apple Intelligence support on your iPad, because this model does not support those features. But for the price point, or your particular use case, or your opinions on Apple Intelligence in general, you might not care about that.

Amazon is offering $50 off the AirPods Pro 2 with clinical grade hearing aid features, as well as some great deals on Apple Watch Series 10, AirTags 4-pack, the M2 MacBook Air, and M2 iPad Air in 13″ and 11″ sizes. Check out the deals below, and enjoy the savings from Amazon!

AirTags 4-pack for $68 (down from $99)

Amazon is selling the AirTags 4-pack for just $68 now, down from the prior low of $70, which is discounted from the $99 retail price. AirTags offer a super easy way to keep track of your personal belongings and pets, or just about anything else you might want to track with the Find My network.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $68 (down from $99)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid functionality – $199 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 are wildly popular headphones, but what makes this particular model unique is they also offer a clinical-grade hearing aid feature for mild to moderate hearing loss, plus Media Assist features that enhances the clarity of music, video, and phone calls. This is in addition to the other popular standard features like high fidelity sound, Active Noice Cancellation, Spatial Audio, water and sweat resistance, customizable fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri commands, great battery life, and a USB-C charging case.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $199 (down from $249)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is a fantastic smart watch for fitness and activity tracking, featuring a 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, activity tracking features, sleep tracking, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, and more. Check out the various band and color sizes to see which you like best.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
